title: Parisian Life Style Private Photo Shoot at Eiffel Tower
description:
Visiting Paris? 

Time to live the dream! 

Walk around the city with a local professional photographer and take home the best images of your amazing trip. In a 100% Parisian life style photo shooting, get to know Paris' highlights and secrets and keep your memories forever. 
 • 1h photo shooting with local professional photographer 
 • 50-80 high resolution EDITED photos sent by mail after the shooting 
 • groups up to ten people! 
 • Ideal for celebrating your honeymoon, engagement photos, bachelor party, family trip, birthdays and more 
 • props included for kids 
 • kids friendly activity 
 • fun, local and 100% passionate photographers!

NOTE: you will be booked in the first available hour. You will receive an email about your tour hour, meeting point and recognizing your photographer within 7 days of booking. Please check your spam and contact with us if you have not received it.

title: Paris Highlights: Half Day Private Walking Tour
description: A perfect introduction to the City of Lights! Meet the city's legacy by exploring the grand monuments that make Paris such a desirable destination - from the Louvre to the Iron Lady herself and everything in between!

title: Semi-Private Louvre Masterpieces with Reserved Entrance Time
description: With a maximum of six people per group, you are guaranteed a nearly private experience! Whether it is your first or one hundredth visit to the Louvre, there is something for everyone on this exclusive tour.  Your expert guide will lead you through the museum as you visit the Louvre’s must-sees.  Marvel at masterpieces in the Louvre’s most significant collections from Mesopotamia to French Romanticism, including, of course, the Mona Lisa, the Venus de Milo, and Winged Victory.

title: Paris City Center "History of Paris" Guided Walking Tour - Semi-Private 8ppl Max
description: on this 2.5 hour intimate Semi-Private (8 Guest Maximum) guided tou of central Paris, Become a true flâneur – French for someone who enjoys a good stroll – Our expert guides will take show you all of the highlights including the Notre Dame Cathedral and the Tuileries Garden while ending where the guillotine once stood at the base of the world’s most famous avenue, the Champs Elysées. There will be time for a snack and restroom break during the walk.

title: Montmartre/Sacre-Coeur/Paris- Artistic & Bohemian Epicenter
description:
You will follow a highly attractive itinerary including history and stories, architecture, street art, local food stores, artists at work in the lively Place de Tertre, walking in the calm cobbled old streets uphill to reach the imposing Basilica of Sacre – Coeur, with a breathtaking panorama view upon the city of Paris.

Your walking tour covers must-see spot as well as hidden treasures of Montmartre Village, walking in the footsteps of the impressionist artists who were inspired by local sites. You see film shot spots of famous French ‘ Amelie of Montmartre’ and many more. You feel the vibes of the hip , artsy and historical Montmartre Village and its eclectic sites. Your tour is tailored to your interests and physical abilities 
 Note : private/ personalized tours possible on request- number of participants- unlimited
 Note: students & group of friends & team- building, special event in a group tours possible on request- number of participants- unlimited

title: Great Women of History walking tour
description: Join the first Paris walking tour devoted entirely to women's history and influence. Meet near the Luxembourg Gardens and take an inspirational 2-hour guided walk through the charming streets of the famous Left Bank, unraveling stories of incredible women at every turn.

title: Latin Quarter Paris - Exclusive Guided Walking Tour
description: With a exclusive guide, take a 2.5-hour walking tour of one of Paris’ oldest and most iconic neighborhoods—the Latin Quarter. You’ll start by the Notre-Dame Cathedral before making your way on foot to the playground of French students and the Lost Generation. Sights include the Panthéon and Luxembourg Garden. Select a morning or afternoon departure time when booking.

title: First Entry Louvre Highlights Private Tour
description:
Experience the Louvre like never before on our 3-hour private tour that starts at the earliest time possible. 

As you walk through the hallowed halls of this iconic museum, you'll see breathtaking masterpieces that are sure to dazzle your senses. Feast your eyes on the Mona Lisa's enigmatic smile, the Winged Victory of Samothrace's magnificent form, and the Venus de Milo's graceful beauty. 

As you take in these incredible works of art, you'll feel a sense of wonder and awe at the sheer scale and majesty of the Louvre's collection. You'll also get to touch history with your own hands as you explore the museum's exhibits up close and personal. 

With our expert guide by your side, you'll learn fascinating stories about the artists behind the works, and gain insights into the cultural significance of each piece. Join us on this unforgettable journey through the Louvre, and create memories that will last a lifetime.

title: Photographer in Paris
description: Hi! I m Nina :) 10 years of experience in photography and same living in Paris - great mix for an excellent photoshooting quality. And a bit of humor and love for meeting new people. I would be glad to meet your for a photo promenade :)

title: Private Half Day Historic Tour
description: Journey through time in the heart of historic Paris. Stroll through the different eras of Paris from Ancient Gaul to the Roman era and Middle Ages of the Left Bank. Crossing the Seine, you will discover Renaissance Paris and the Grand Siècle.

title: Food tour Belleville Off the Beaten Path 10:30 am
description:
Did you know that the selection of addresses for our Food tour is carefully prepared over several months?
- Meeting with producers/artisans
- Visit of the production workshops
Belleville is in the heart of the artistic village with a bohemian spirit..
Starting at the Jourdain church, this guided tour by an expert in French gastronomy will begin with a culinary discovery, at the highest point of Paris.
For three hours, meet passionate local artisans, the best in their field, and taste bread and croissant, iconic Parisian travel cake, chocolates, coffee, salame or oysters. 
On your way, settle down in a bistro for a cheese and wine pairing.Visit a baker's kitchen (according to the sanitary rules in force) Learn how to make a baguette and a real butter croissant. 
Many anecdotes will be told to you as well as our French gastronomic exception. Paris A Dream is a local company that has only one desire: to promote our French know-how and provide you with unforgettable experiences.

title: Stroll a Local French market & have a picnic
description:
This perfect food lovers activity has been picked to be featured on NBC Today Show with Hoda & Jenna. Segment hosted by Donna Farizan.
Paris is known as a major gastronomical dream destination and French markets are the perfect place to begin. So, come along for an informative stroll at a lively, colorful and true local outdoor market. You'll indulge your senses with an abundance of aromas, of colors while sharpening your taste buds with local delights.

You'll learn informally all about this exciting aspect of our French lifestyle. With the help of your knowledgeable and personable guide, you'll use easy French key sentences to easily interact with vendors and feel like a Parisian for the day. A convivial French picnic with wine and our selection from the market will follow at a nearby peaceful park. The perfect reward to sprinkle up your Parisian journey. Joyfully Yours !

title: Paris: Small Group WineTasting Tour with Expert Sommelier
description: Join an expert sommelier at a contemporary private bar in the historic Montmartre neighbourhood, once home to artists and writers. Discover the captivating facets of French wine. Enjoy five delicious French wines, each with its own delicate notes and fascinating back story. Each tasting is paired with the perfect light snack. Learn how to navigate the wine shelves, about what is revolutionizing the French wine scene and the impact of climate change on the wine world,.

title: Unique 2 Hour Wine Tasting with a Certified Parisian Sommelier
description:
Discover and taste French wines in a choice of secret locations around Paris, truly an unforgettable fun way to experience Paris while enjoying French wines with a Paris local. 

Your host is a WSET Level 3 certified Sommelier, with speciality on French wines, whisky and sake. He is well known in Paris and you can't get a better Parisian host to take you through the enjoyment of French wines. 

Our locations are hand selected in Paris underground style secret spots that you won't know to experience if not for this wine tasting experience. It will be like meeting and having a drink with a local. What a great way to spend your time in Paris! There is no other wine tasting like this unique offering so book now and don't miss out.

title: Explore Hidden bars and Speakeasies in Paris
description:
Paris offers a lot of speakeasy bars for night owls, follow us through these hidden bars and enjoy a night full of adventure.

Our tour is an opportunity to experience the Parisian night life like a local. Come ready to discover secret entrances, enjoy amazing cocktails and good music. 
Each bar has a different vibe. Some have hidden doors, some require codes for entry while others are only accessible by invitation.

We offer the tour on other platforms, so if you cannot find the time/date that works with your schedule, send us a message!

title: Paris Local Market & Bastille District Food Tasting Tour
description:
Enjoy a Food Tour in one of the most authentic and intense areas of Paris far from the main tourist attractions!

Start the tour discovering the legendary Place de la Bastille, symbol of the french revolution, which is located in the 12th arrondissement, few minutes from the Seine river and the Marais district. You will enjoy there typical Parisian breakfast before heading to the Aligre Market through the innumerable (and almost secret) passages that make this district a trendy and creative place.

The Aligre market is one of the best known of Parisian foodies. He operate every morning (except on Mondays) and its stallholders welcome you right on the streets of the Aligre square. Its a fabulous mix between food sellers (inside and outside) and antique dealers, half of food market, half of a flea market.

Around this market, the diversity of shops related to the art of good cooking impresses gourmets from all around the world who are the most passionate about its diversity and richness.

title: Private Dark Chocolate Tasting Tour in Paris
description: Treat yourself to a two hour introduction to the world of fine dark chocolate bars. You will learn not only on the chocolate history, but also how to recognize, appreciate and enjoy a fine dark chocolate bar.

title: Wine Tasting in Paris right next to Père Lachaise & l'Atelier des lumières
description:
Once at the shop, we will host you with the great pleasure of introducing you to our wines, which come directly from the collective of winemakers who own the shop. Our knowledge and advice are at your disposal!
We have a wide variety of wines (white, red, rosé, sparkling) from the major French wine regions. For your 3 glasses of wine included, you have the possibility to choose the profile of the wines you prefer! Otherwise, let us surprise you with our advice.

With the wines selected, and a planche of aperitif prepared, on with the tasting. We have a close, familial relationship with the winemakers, which means we can have even the most technical details for you. Otherwise, it's about sharing a convivial moment with some good wine!

All are accompanied by a great selection of music with our famous tournedisc!

title: Private Foodie Tour in Paris: Exquisite French Cuisine
description: You will spend 3 hours in a private tour with a local guide, stopping at 4 places in the best restaurants and markets of Le Marais district. You will be tasting food such as 'charcuterie', gourmet dishes, french tapas, etc. You'll also enjoy 4 alcoholic or soft drinks per guest while visiting the highlights of one of Paris' most historical districts (Le Marais), with such landmarks as Place des Vosges, Hôtel de Sully and National Archives Museum. As a desert you'll be invited to enjoy 1 sweet french crêpe per guest) Our menus are adapted to different diets (celiacs/vegetarians/vegans). During this tour you'll be trying more than 10 different tastes, from sophisticated gourmet dishes to classic Parisian crepes, french wines and beer. You'll be getting insights from your local guide (which can also be customized at your request) while walking through one of the most authentic neighborhoods of Paris: Le Marais. Remember, this is a private tour, just you and your guide.

title: Wonders of Paris by bike (night)
description:
A tour around the wonders of Paris in the night and appreciated the lightening places that are the most attractive on the night like the Eiffel Tower, Invalides and Alexandre III bredge, Champs elysées, Concorde Place, the Louvre and the Notre Dame.

After the tour, we will go in the most beautiful and local place for take a wine and cheese in an authentic french bar
